name: Pub MQTT Turn Off Upstairs All
Choose Random Playlist
Pub MQTT Turn Off Upstairs ALL
Random Colour

Random Effect
Sub MQTT Turn Off Upstairs All

Switch Topic to Entity ID

Volume Up
func:

name: Volume Down
func:
msg.custom.service = "volume_down";
return msg;

name: Play/Pause
func:
msg.custom.service = "media_play_pause";
return msg;

name: Skip Forward
func:
msg.custom.service = "media_next_track";
return msg;

name: Skip Backward
func:
msg.custom.service = "media_previous_track";
return msg;

name: Switch Topic to Entity ID
func:
msg.custom.entity_id = "media_player.downstairs";
return msg;

info: If downstairs is playing override the target device of kitchen speaker

name: Calc Day of Year
Delay for 30 seconds
Check is Media Player is still off
Between 6am and 8am
Set Routine Running Global
func:
flow.set("tv_time_routine_running", true);
return msg;

name: Toggle Service
func:
msg.service = msg.payload == "on" ? "turn_on" : "turn_off";
return msg;

name: Set Routine Running Global
func:
flow.set("tv_time_routine_running", false);
return msg;

name: Toggle Service
func:
msg.service = msg.payload == "playing" ? "turn_on" : "turn_off";
return msg;

name: TTS Announce
data: {"message":"Its bedtime for the babies, lets go to bed"}
